panels.description: Conexões com o database em timeout
panels.title: DB timeout

panels.description: Erros de autenticação no último minuto
panels.title: Auth Errors

panels.description: Warning e erros logados nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: Warn & Error Log

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})

(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"}) * 100) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})

panels.description: Número de erros 500 nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: ERROR 500

panels.description: Número de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: Total Requests/s

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="500"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="400"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="404"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])

panels.title: Response Time

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m])

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION
